text: Preble is an unincorporated community in Preble Township, Adams County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. ==History== A post office was established at Preble in 1883. It was named from Preble Township. ==Sites== Preble includes a post office, a volunteer fire department, a grainery and an outdoor arena. ==Geography== Preble is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Adams County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana
title: Preble, Indiana
